name: rrdtool
description: RA tool for data logging and analysis.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependencies.name: pango
dependencies.description:
Pango is a library for laying out and rendering of text, with an
emphasis on internationalization. It can be used anywhere that text
layout is needed, though most of the work on Pango so far has been done
in the context of the GTK+ widget toolkit.

dependencies.name: lua
dependencies.description: The Lua programming language interpreter and library.

dependencies.name: perl-extutils-makemaker
dependencies.description:
ExtUtils::MakeMaker - Create a module Makefile. This utility is designed
to write a Makefile for an extension module from a Makefile.PL. It is
based on the Makefile.SH model provided by Andy Dougherty and the
perl5-porters.
